I just crashed the game, again.  This time with a thief.

I found that max value for buying str for a thief in in the 25000s.  
Once you pass that point, all the str is free.  Max value for health 
should be set somewhere below 5000 for a thief because at health level 
5000 and exp level 469, your health value gets displayed as a negative 
number and anything can kill you.
